children.text:
Universal Orlando Resort™
At Universal Orlando Resort™ you’ll discover three amazing theme parks, unforgettable dining, and incredible  entertainment, all in one convenient location. Jump into the action of your favorite films and TV shows at Universal Studios  Florida™, where you’ll experience exhilarating attractions like TRANSFORMERS: The Ride-3D and Despicable Me Minion  Mayhem™. Right next door you can experience the pulse-pounding thrills of Universal’s Islands of Adventure™, featuring rides  and attractions like The Amazing Adventures of Spider-Man®, the Jurassic Park River Adventure™, and the new ride Skull  Island: Reign of Kong™. Finally, Enjoy the thrills and relaxation of a tropical paradise like no other at Universal’s Volcano Bay™ water theme park, opening early summer 2017. Plus, you can experience the magic and excitement of the two unique lands of The  Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ – Hogsmeade™ and Diagon Alley™ – located at Universal Studios Florida™ and Universal’s Islands of Adventure™. With a Park-to-Park admission ticket you can even ride between both lands on the Hogwarts™ Express*. Enjoy the best in  casual and fine dining, live music, movies, shopping and more at Universal CityWalk™, home of the incomparable Blue Man Group. It’s days and nights of endless fun for every member of the family. Vacation beyond anything you’ve experienced before at Universal Orlando Resort™.

Universal Studios Florida™
At the world’s premier movie and TV based theme park you’ll experience the magic and excitement of The Wizarding World of Harry  Potter™ - Diagon Alley™, join the battle on TRANSFORMERS: The Ride–3D, be transformed into a Minion on Despicable Me Minion  Mayhem™, and crash through Krustyland on The Simpsons Ride™.

Universal’s Islands of Adventure™
Take an unforgettable journey through uniquely themed islands where  your favorite adventures come to life. Help save the city on The  Amazing Adventures of Spider-Man®; escape the jaws of a T. rex on  the Jurassic Park River Adventure™; experience the new ride Skull  Island: Reign of Kong™, Now Open; and soar above Hogwarts™ at  The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ - Hogsmeade™.

Universal’s Volcano Bay™
Enjoy the thrills and relaxation of a tropical paradise like no other. At the all-new Universal’s Volcano Bay™ water theme park, opening in 2017, you’ll find an oasis of excitement along with laid back luxuries creating an entirely new vacation experience.

The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™-Hogsmeade™ and Diagon Alley™
Experience both The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ – Hogsmeade™ and Diagon Alley™. With a Park-to-Park admission ticket you can ride the Hogwarts™ Express* between Hogsmeade™ Station in Universal's Islands of Adventure™ and King's Cross Station in  Universal Studios Florida™. You'll have our entire Universe of action and thrills at your fingertips.

Universal CityWalk™
It’s the one place where the dining tastes of every member of the family and entertainment everyone can enjoy all intersect. Enjoy the best in  casual and fine dining, live music, movies, shopping, miniature golf, the  incomparable Blue Man Group and more. It’s everything you’re looking  for. And anything but ordinary. Universal CityWalk™, The Epicenter of  Awesome.

Blue Man Group
Blue Man Group is comedy, theater, rock concert and dance party all rolled into one. This wildly popular phenomenon delivers an unforgettable, multi-sensory experience. It’s an outrageous evening of entertainment. See the show that has captivated 35 million  people worldwide. Blue Man Group - enemy of monotony, remedy for boredom, promoter of overjoy and elation. Dare to Live in Full Color.
